## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 100,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a safety margin, ensuring stock availability over the next 5 days while also taking into account lead time. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 50,000 units higher than the player's plan |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 1.4 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                  |
| Comments                          | Purchasing in multiples of 20,000 units minimizes the number of orders while maximizing the discount opportunity. |
